obathumata waradinne na.

prawahana amathya kumara welgama saha dumriya baladharin pirisak ema sthanayata gos pariksha kala bawa da apa warthakaru sandahan kale ya.

man hithanne pa්ragnyawa nathi godak ayata aanandaya na kiyala.
ajith thilakasenayan ge keti kathawa thulin mama dakketh eekayi.
ee hinda hamudawa kawadawath mama awathakseru karala katha karala naha.“
